page.title: 14Secondary Education in Soham
page.content: The{Village College,}Soham, is a community college which provides eduational facilities for the people of Soham and surrounding communities, with a catchment area of some 13,000 people. The college includes a mixed County Secondary Comprehensive School for about 960 children between the ages of 11-16 years, a youth club and a wide range of activities and affiliated clubs for adults. At 16, young people can transfer to the Sixth Form at Ely,follow courses at one of the colleges in Cambridge, or the college of Further Education and Horticulture at Wisbech. A number of pupils also transfer to the Sixth Forms of Public Schools, some gaining Open Scholarships to universities.
